comment: Thanks for your helpful response. I need to think about what you wrote, but in the meantime I wanted to add two more stars for you.  Original review: Can't trust latest update. Author claims just UI tweaks, but the app is now requesting access to identity info and photos/media files. Please disclose why you suddenly need access to all of that info.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content:
Thanks for 2 more stars :)

Read/write external storage permission has been removed in latest update

"identity info" permission: We have a functionality to unlock "pro" features in the app. This permission enables to restore the pro features even if a user deletes unlocked app and installs it again or when they change their phone.

author: darksun b
comment: But not the most polished or user friendly
title: Very useful

author: Jason Chance
comment: Great timer and app easy to use. Wish that I could make different length timers in the same preset instead of just one time length for all rounds.
title: Great HIIT counter for Wear intergration

author: Stephen Van zuyen
comment: Love it, just wish I could save more presets without paying
title: Great app

author: Manuel Pulgar
comment: Do my intense cycles here. Very useful
title: Great app

author: Richard Kase
comment: This app is great, but I would recommend that a timer in between sets be added. I use it for hangboarding, and being able to time out a 3 min. rest between sets of grips.
title: Great app! But I have one suggestion

author: Sam Garvey
comment: Get it now if you wanna do more and program less.  Super easy to use.
title: Elegant and Intuitive

comment: Flexible enough for my physio exercises

author: Claudiu Ionescu
comment: The best aplication

author: Martin Kolek
comment: As I said, great interface, big buttons for easy controlling, various useful settings. As soon as author fix the last thing, as he said, I'll give it 5 star.

author: Juliet Chen
comment: It's great to customise intervals so you don't need to control the time during the workout or stretches. Definitely recommend it!
title: Best time for workout!

author: Vivek Shiwach
comment: If name (or atleast number) of exercises can also be spoken by it, I would go to paid version and then 5 Stars!!!

author: Prakash Poptani
comment: Good app for workouts!

author: D Miller
comment: Would give it a 5 if I could switch apps while the timer is running. Update -  it does now

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: iCountTimer now runs in background. Now you can switch the apps.

title: Good app

author: Kevin Huber
comment: Remplie parfaitement ça fonction. Dommage qu'elle ne puisse pas fonctionner en arrière plan :/. Fonction ajouté, merci ;)

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Now the app runs in background. :)

title: Presque parfait

author: YGGTOYA
comment: This has help me so much on my sets. It's easy and so convenient. And will have you coming back for more! Stay fit! :)
title: Best Ever

author: Jonathan Kim
comment: Confusing

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: We have tried to make things more intuitive. To enter values, you will have to touch and slide the bottom bar. There are 2 main functions: counter with counts and interval between counts, rest and rounds. And timer with work/rest periods and rounds. Feel free to contact support for any additional help. We would be happy to help.

author: Rick Reid
comment: A superb gym companion!
title: ICountTimer

author: Jomsy Thomas
comment: Superb gym companion!

author: Aniket Borhade
comment: I upgraded to it's pro version.
title: Nice:

author: Adel Ammari
comment: Instead of getting the pro version for free with stelaApps, I get a message that says I am not licensed!!!

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Sorry you could not unlock pro features. Is there any way we can help? The recent update of app has many new features and enhancements. Do give it a try!

title: StelaApps Download

author: Nicholas Shelhart
comment: Works
title: Cool

author: John Hinck
comment: I'm getting more exercising on as a result of this tool!   Wish I could save settings in groups so that I could proceed through various sets of exercises. Would also like a setting for the delay between those sets as it takes different amounts of time to transition from one set of exercise to another.
title: Excellent for free!

author: mark clews
comment: Been looking for something like this for a while, now I know how many sets of an exercise I've done without guessing, and I can concentrate on what I should be doing
title: A very good app

author: Robert Masciocchi
comment: Works well and looks good, but would be much more useful if it had the following features: - Allow to save timers, and give them a name, instead of having to change the data for each type of exercise. - Build in reminders (set time and days of week) which generate a notification at a set time, to remind the user to perform his exercise.  Also, I'm having issues with the app registering touches to the "Rounds" at the bottom of the screen. It seemingly randomly does not react when touching to modify the number of rounds.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Thanks for your nice feedback. We have noted down your suggestions and we would be working on making iCountTimer more useful while still maintaining its simplicity. **Update: Now you can save timers/counters with a name as presets.

title: Very good, but needs a couple more features

author: Ethan Hughes
comment: So help full you dont have to keep an eye on the clock the app tells you its like having a fitness coach in your room get the app now
title: Get it now

author: Rebecca Cool
comment: Was working now it stopped. I don't have the pro features anymore.

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content:
Did you get it working?

Older reply: No worries Rebecca. Contact support and we will help you get back the pro features.

title: APPGRATIS

author: Todd Parker
comment: Best timer ever... Period. I speak as a coach who has used both iOS and Android and this timer is easiest way to set up interval training ever.
title: As a coach, the best.

author: Mark Grant
title: Does what it does very well

author: Emery Persinger
comment: The PRO VERSION unlocked perfectly!!!  IF, AND ONLY IF, you have APPGRATIS installed on your phone AND go through it to download/install this App. The 1 star rating I saw regarding "trick" was unjustly deserved and should be ignored. Note: To my knowledge,  this GENEROUS promo is for TODAY ONLY VIA AppGratis! Thank you for your hard work
title: Simply Efficacious!

author: Kevin Chan
comment: Badly need presets. If you do more than one type of exercise during a session, which presumably most people do, you need presets since different exercises might have current counts, interval, and rest periods, and it is a terrible hassle having to change the values between exercises each time. The ability to save & reuse presets, preferably with user-customizable titles, will be a great help. NOW SUPPORT PRESETS!

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: That's a nice idea. We would be working on it trying to make iCountTimer more useful while still maintaining its simplicity. Thanks for your feedback.

title: Presets

author: Michael In San Francisco
comment: This app has a lot of options and I really enjoy using it on my gym workouts and bike rides.  It appears a lot of work went into programming this app and I really appreciate the effort.  By the way, I have app gratis installed on my phone and the Pro version unlocked as soon as I opened the program. That's the way I like it, a free upgrade to the pro version.
title: Wow love this app on workouts

author: Boomer
comment: Says download complete then goes blank followed by the App Store shutting down. Very frustrating!

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Unusual behavior. Did you try to install once again? Please email us at icounttimer@gmail.com so that we can help you out.

title: Won't install

author: Josep M. Fontana
comment: A very good and very practical tool. This is way better than the usual timers and it has multiple uses. You can easily implement the Pomodoro technique, for instance. You have to pay quite a bit more to get a good app for the Pomodoro technique. But iCountTimer is very versatile, you can do much more than just the Pomodoro thing. Kudos for the developer.  JM

reply.author: RhythmicWorks
reply.content: Ok great! No issues. 'Unlock via AppGratis' did appear confusing to some folks(until we updated the description with more details) as we received few emails and a couple of 1 star ratings because people were unable to avail the offer. But, glad that you could unlock it before the end of offer :)

title: JMF

comment: I downloaded this app via Appgratis, and all features were unlocked, as advertised! I gave iCount Timer 5 stars because it's perfect, for this type of app. It does exactly what it's supposed to do, and very easy to use!
